summary: CONSUMER CONTACTED MANUFACTURER ON 01/17/02 REGARDING ANTI-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM COMPLAINT.  MANUFACTURER ADVISED CONSUMER THAT VEHICLE HAD 3 OPEN RECALLS THAT CONSUMER NEVER RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF.  CONSUMER WAS FIRST OWNER OF VEHICLE AND ADDRESS INFORMATION WAS CORRECTLY LISTED IN SYSTEM.  RECALL CAMPAIGNS; 00V345000, 00X001000, 98V242000.*AK
